body.p: The Wine development release 1.1.32 is now available.

What's new in this release:
Many crypto fixes, particularly on 64-bit.
Improved DVD access on Mac OS.
Several common controls improvements.
Various HTML support improvements.
More DIB optimizations.
Various bug fixes.

p.p: The source is available now. Binary packages are in the process of being built, and will appear soon at their respective download locations.
